AAAAAAAAAAAAIIII IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEE!

AAAAAAAAAAAAIIII IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEE!

Uuughn! You little... Well, that's fine! Just fine!

(Don't break down, Mimi. You'll only give her the satisfaction of knowing she was right. No matter how much this damn beret is gonna cost you.)

You... still... don't... get... it...
Damn! I still had hairbands in for my braid! I could've lasted longer! It's that stupid costume! I wasn't used to wearing it!

Fine. I'll masturbate, but this isn't the last you'll see of me.

I forgot about my beret! I could've won this game!

scene.name: The Bar
scene.directive: She had to stay outside her apartment like that for almost an hour!
I don't really get out all that much.
I don't really get to be myself all that often...
I know whever we go out to places, it always ends up having to be some sad dive bar.
The drinks all taste like the color brown...
That piano player has played the same song twelve times now and still hasnt got it right.
And Im pretty sure my purse has been stolen and restolen so many times, that it somehow just cycled back to me having it.
its one of the only places in town where I can lie low
Since this time I, more or less, picked where we went out, next time well do something for you.
For now, let's go back to my place and maybe watch a movie or somethin'.
Now let's ditch this pig sty!
Just don't touch my car on the way there. Got it?

scene.name: Bedroom Pre-movie
scene.directive: I was thinkin about a movie for tonight.
Ive only got the one tv, so well have to watch in here.
How do you feel about Hot Under the Knife?
...And one of the only movies I have...
I know it was kinda a risky pick, since you said you hadn't seen it...
But I think you'll enjoy it.
I know it really speaks to me...
You just relax on the bed.

scene.name: Movie Time
scene.directive: Weve finally found the patients missing heart!
Now, we can finally begin the operation!
What about the pain in my heart?
Kate Hall is so good in this
My sister and I used to watch her cooking show all the time when we were kids
Wed always try to make whatever we saw on the show.
Mostly we just made a mess
And the guy in this, Manuel...
Havent seen him in anything recent, though.

scene.name: Movie Time 2: Electric Boogaloo
scene.directive: Quickly! I have to save him! Hes my true love!
I think I found what was blocking his coronary artery
You committed medical malpractice on yourself
I did it for you, my love!
But the anaesthetics shouldnt have worn off yet!
I lowered my dose so that Id awaken as soon as you found my symbol of our eternal love!
But doctor! Youre in the middle of open heart surgery!
No pain can hurt as much as the feeling I have when Im away from you
Could you make a little more, ~player~?
I think I left the box out on the counter
Ill pause the movie til you come back.
Can I, like, get some help?

scene.name: Return to the Room
scene.directive: Oh, its you Mr. Smith, Esq., right?
Anyways, Mr. Smith, like, thanks for your help!
I thought that the popcorn might stain my shirt, so I decided to take it off.
If Im not wearing a shirt, it cant get stained, right?
...But now this just, like, feels kinda awkward.
Its cause youre wearing that shirt!
No one else here is wearing one, so you shouldnt either, ~player~!
Except, like, I still have a bra on, of course!
Did I get some popcorn butter on my bra?
Quick! Like, cover me up with something!
Y'know, if you're just gonna keep them there...
Maybe you could, like, rub your hands around a bit?
Like, I think on the trip here I pulled a
I bought something that might be useful here!
Now, where did I leave it?

scene.name: The Search
scene.directive: Maybe I still have it on me?
Aww butts... I forgot socks again...
Could you, like, do a little searching, too, ~player~? You'll, like, know what you're looking for when you see it.
It's gotta be around here somewhere...
Well, it's definitely not in these panties...
Like, that'd just be waaaay too out there.
Like, I just remembered where I put it!
I'm not sure if you've, like, noticed, but I am, like, suuuuch an airhead sometimes!
What do you mean you dont need it?
When did you get so smart?
You're sooo cute, trying not to blush.
I'm sure you've already figured out where this night is heading.

scene.name: It's Going Down
scene.directive: Like, just let me warm up a little bit more...
Just ...ah... remember I called dibs on being on top!
Those are the rules, so you gotta let me! Mph...
Just gotta get things all lined up, like its darts.
Ready? You're not, like, busy or nothing, right?
Am... am I doing this right?
Do I need to, like, grab the dildo?
L-like I think Im getting the hang of this!
It'll be as if we'll ride off into the sunset, like one of those girls who handles cows!
One of those girl... cow things... Yeah!
Think you'd be this good, ~player~! Ah!
Ah! I can't k-keep up the act anymore!

scene.name: Afterward
scene.directive: So how would you rate my performance?
I think I deserve an award or two for that one.
Or are you still screaming for more?
I was never much of a performer, but I know when an audience demands an encore.
You mean, like, a kitty, right?
I don't have one of those, but I have these tooootally cute ears and, like, I could use my tongue to...
Would you rather I just... be myself for this one?
I... never thought things would end up going this way.
Why don't you come here and show me how it's done?
